DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate efficacy safety treatment overactive bladder darifenacin administer alone conjunction behavioral modification therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Using Behavioral Therapy Combination With Darifenacin Symptoms Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Symptoms overactive bladder Capable independent toileting complete micturition diary Able comprehend English follow study procedure instruction Post void residual > 100ml/sec Urine flow rate ( Qmax ) < 10ml/sec male Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
